pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorCoursesBrea(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=yes,EnableViewPortScale=yes"); var iabClose = function(data) {window.location.href="index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);}

function pageprocessorDirectoryBrea(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=yes,EnableViewPortScale=yes"); var iabClose = function(data) {window.location.href="index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);}

function pageprocessorNews(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$.blockUI();var feed = new google.feeds.Feed(pagedef.url);feed.setNumEntries(-1);feed.setResultFormat(google.feeds.Feed.JSON);feed.load(function(result) {if(!result.error) {$scope.feeds=result.feed.entries;$rootScope.feeds = result.feed.entries;var data = '
';data = $(data).append($(pagedef.datatemplate));var data1 = $compile($(data))($scope);$('#appContent').append(data1);$scope.$apply();$.unblockUI();}});}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorEmergency(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.contacts = $.parseJSON(pagedef.contactdetails);   var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.pageTemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$scope.$apply();}

{{title}}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorVideosVideosDetails(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope,$sce, $window, $location) { var video = $rootScope.videos[$routeParams.index];$scope.video = video; $scope.title=video.title.$t;var temp = video.id.$t;var tempId = temp.substring(temp.lastIndexOf("/") + 1);$scope.id = tempId;$scope.trustSrc = function() {return $sce.trustAsResourceUrl("http://www.youtube.com/embed/" + tempId);};$scope.description=video.media$group.media$description.$t;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}

function pageprocessorVideos(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { $.blockUI();$http.get(pagedef.url).success( function(data) {$scope.videos = data.feed.entry;$rootScope.videos = data.feed.entry;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$.unblockUI();}).error ( function(data) {$.unblockUI();});}

function pageprocessorTwitter(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=yes,EnableViewPortScale=yes"); var iabClose = function(data) {window.location.href="index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);}
